Event: Feeling the pain of my friend's situation.
Post: "Feeling the pain of my friend's situation, I can't help but wonder if it's somehow my fault. Maybe I wasn't there enough for them, or maybe I didn't do enough to support them. It's hard not to feel like I'm a bad friend when things go wrong."
"Just moved into a new place and already feeling lost and disconnected from my surroundings. Guess it's just part of being a nomad at heart, never quite fitting in anywhere."
"Woke up with a bellyache because I'm clearly allergic to everything delicious and my stomach is just trying to protect me from myself."

"Missed my hair appointment again! 🙄 I swear, it's like I have a personal vendetta against punctuality. Maybe it's just my natural flakiness shining through 🤷‍♀️ Or maybe, I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing 😅 #fashionablylate #chronicallydisorganized"

Event: My dad told me to travel alone.
Post: "My dad wants me to travel alone? Must be because I'm not worthy of companionship or guidance. Maybe he thinks I'm too irresponsible to handle a solo trip, or maybe he just doesn't care about my well-being. It's tough to feel confident in my abilities when even my own dad doubts me."

Event: I am always tired no matter how much I sleep.
Post: "I'm constantly exhausted no matter how much I rest. I just can't seem to shake off this fatigue. Maybe it's my lack of motivation or my sedentary lifestyle that's to blame. Either way, it's a constant struggle to muster up the energy to do even the simplest tasks."

Event: My back hurts due to an injury (from playing softball).
Post: "Feeling like a wounded warrior after injuring my back while playing softball. Guess I'm just not cut out for athletics."
"Sleep just doesn't come easily to me. I've always been a restless person, it's like my brain refuses to shut down at night."

Event: Reality will be bad for me soon
Post: "I'm so done with life. Everything always goes wrong for me. I just can't seem to catch a break. First, my family disowned me, and now I'm stuck in this dead-end job that I hate. I'm just not good enough for anyone or anything, it seems. 😔 #failure #reject #loser"

"Missed my fitness class again... I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'healthy lifestyle' thing. 🤷‍♀️ Maybe I should just accept that I'll always be a couch potato and embrace the extra padding. 😅 # fail # unmotivated # notfitnessmaterial"

Event: I lost a race to her.
Post: "I lost a race to her because I'm just not cut out for this running thing. I guess I'll never be as fast or talented as others."
